item.description: Welcome! I'm Sandy, I am passionate about math. My aim is to provide a safe, friendly, fun environment where the student will not only be successful but also enjoy learning. I commit to offering your child the care and attention he needs to succeed. I am patient, yet not content to let any student do less than their best. The pace will be tailored to your child's individual needs.

Message sent! if (window.location.hash === '#success'){ document.getElementById("thanks-alert").style.display = ''; window.setTimeout(function() { document.getElementById("thanks-alert").style.display = 'none'; }, 3000); } header {box-shadow:0 2px 4px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.14);} Have a question or want to know more? Leave me a Message below Full Name: Phone Number: Email Address: Message: Send Message Or reach me directly Phone: (561) 654-1889 Email: sandytiller@yahoo.

#services img { border-radius: 50%; width: 160px; height: 160px; flex-shrink: 0; } @media(max-width:768px){ .chunk{ display:inline-flex; flex-wrap:wrap; justify-content:center; } #services h2{ text-align: center; } } TROUBLESHOOTING Are you home educating and just need a little extra help with difficult concepts? I can fill in those gaps for you. TEST PREPARATION Is your child about to take the PSAT, SAT or ACT where a high score can mean scholarship money?

Home Education Mom Sandy has helped make what seemed impossible, possible. She has an excelllent way of relating the concepts and recognizes the roadblocks that may prevent future success. ~ Sherry J. Home Education Mom My son has had the privilege of sitting under Sandy's tutelage and I am amazed at how very far she has taken him. She is incredibly thorough and does not let her students progress without full understanding.
